level.heading: On-site medication review.
level.text: The ALR shall arrange for an on-site review by a registered nurse every 45 days to:
Supervise the administration of medications by Trained Medication Employees;
Assess the resident's response to medication; and
Assess the resident's ability to continue to self-administer his or her medications.
